summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ExamShield online exam platform with anti-cheat features. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend flows work excellently with minor clipboard permission issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied when copying exam link
ui_bugs.details: Browser security prevents clipboard access, functionality works but shows error in console

passed_tests: Backend API - All 10 endpoints (100% success rate)
Exam creation with multiple question types
Student exam access via link (no login required)
Student information form with dynamic fields
Exam taking interface with question navigation
Multiple choice, true/false, and short answer questions
Anti-cheat measures implementation (fullscreen, tab detection, copy/paste prevention, etc.)
